title: I need help fixing my ingame cursor and ability to chat.
body:
It started about 2-3 days ago when I was playing Yasuo, I was trying to chat and I clicked a lot of the buttons above the arrow keys on accident, inturn it glitched my mouse to the default cursor and I was unable to chat, the enter key WOULD NOT open up the chat box or anything.

I did everything I know to attempt to fix it, I checked league for corruption, I uninstalled every little bit of the game and reinstalled it. I have reset my keybinds thinking that may help but it didn't.

Please help, I have tried over and over again. Every game I play I am unable to chat with my team or enemies and my cursor isn't the normal league cursor.

replies.body:
You mentioned having tried resetting your keybinds to fix this, but let's make sure it was done in the right order juuuuust to be 100% sure that it would have taken effect. Sometimes config resets just need to be in a very specific order to make it click.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
